title: SURI Electric Toothbrush—Award-Winning Sustainable Electric Toothbrushes Adults, Slim Sonic Toothbrush & Accessories, 40+ Day Battery, Travel Toothbrush with UV Cleaning Case. Certified B Corp
features: 3X CLEANER TEETH AFTER JUST ONE USE - Designed & tested by Dentists. Our SURI toothbrush is clinically tested to remove 300% more plaque than a manual toothbrush. Electric is the way to go for those looking for healthier teeth and less sensitive gums

DESIGNED IN LONDON - Slim yet powerful. SURI's award-winning sonic toothbrush is 1/2 the size of a standard electric tooth brush and delivers a professional sonic clean by vibrating over 33,000 times per minute.

RECYCLABLE PLANT-BASED HEADS and BRISTLES - SURI's eco-conscious electric toothbrush uses brush heads made of renewable cornstarch, and medium-soft bristles made from castor oil. SURI also offers a simple and FREE recycling service in the US.

DURABLE ALUMINIUM BODY—BUILT TO LAST - Light, sleek and IPX7 waterproof. Available in five colours. Always wanted a pink electric toothbrush? You’re in luck. SURI's brush has a 2-minute timer and two powerful brushing modes for deep cleaning.

LONG 40+ DAY BATTERY LIFE - Imagine only needing to charge your toothbrush once a month. Our rechargeable toothbrush for adults lasts over 40 days and recharges in just 4 hours via USB. A dependable electric toothbrush—battery powered and ready to go
